recipe.name: Shrimp Casserole
recipe.notes: This dish is the sort of thing you'd expect from a person named "Lola Pickles" because both seem equally improbable.
recipe.preparation: Devil 4-6 eggs.  Place halves on bottom of greased casserole.Pour over 1/3 can of mushroom soup.Then in layers: 1 - 4 1/2 oz can broken shrimp1/3 can mushroom soup1/2 cup cheddar cheese crumbsTop with corn flake crumbs or special K.  Set in a pan of water.  Bake at 300F for 1/2 hour
